name: Sluggy's Tiny Adventure
description:
Sluggy's Tiny Adventure!

Game by Francis Coulombe, made for Ludum Dare 35 in 48 hours.

Ludum Dare page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...

Theme of the competition: Shapeshifter

Escape your glass prison and kill the Wizard.

Arrow Keys to move, X to jump, C to attack, number keys to shapeshift.

I have been working more on this game, and the project is now on Steam Greenlight! If you liked this game jam version, please consider giving the game a vote: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=677647282
